short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block any site to avoid distraction

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus: Block Websites extension helps you stay productive by blocking distracting websites in your Chrome.

It's super easy to use: just add sites to a block list, and whenever you try to visit them, you'll be shown a motivational quote instead. If you still need to access a site, you can take 10 minutes pause, switch to "pause" mode, or easily remove the required website from the block list with just a click. 

Stay focused and inspired with this simple and effective blocking extension!
Easy, free, no ads!
Just focus.
